entries.title: Riffusion’s AI generates music from text using visual sonograms
entries.description: Stable Diffusion-powered music generator processes sound in the visual space.

entries.title: Twitter stiffs software vendor with $8 million left on contract, lawsuit says
entries.description: Lawsuit: Twitter has refused to make required payments since Musk took over.

entries.title: Forget The Witcher and Superman: Henry Cavill to lead Warhammer 40K dream project
entries.description: Amazon acquired the rights to potentially create its own cinematic universe.

entries.title: Steam Deck 2.0 could focus on battery life over better performance
entries.description: Positioning profusely powerful portable processors not a priority for Valve.

entries.title: Linux, Amazon, Meta, and Microsoft want to break the Google Maps monopoly
entries.description: Overture Maps Foundation wants to end the oppressive rule of the Google Maps API.

entries.title: PineTab 2 is another try at a Linux-based tablet, without the 2020 supply crunch
entries.description: 10-inch tablet with detachable keyboard case should be available in early 2023.

entries.title: Musk suspends NYT and WaPo reporters from Twitter, claims they doxxed him
entries.description: NYT and Washington Post say Twitter provided no explanation for suspensions.

entries.title: US lawmakers take aim at gaming’s “harassment and extremism” problem
entries.description: Letters to gaming companies could be first step toward hearings or gov't action.

entries.title: Here’s what we know, and what we don’t, about the damaged Soyuz spacecraft
entries.description: The biggest concern is the flight computers on board the Soyuz spacecraft.

entries.title: Do Cruise’s AVs brake-check other drivers? Feds are investigating
entries.description: Three Cruise AVs have been rear-ended after braking too hard while being followed.

entries.title: Weird quantum effect used for highly precise interferometer
entries.description: Interference patterns in a cloud of atoms made in a portable device.

entries.title: Bio-based plastics aim to capture carbon… but at what cost?
entries.description: Growing crops to make plastic could cut fossil fuel use, pull carbon out of the atmosphere.

entries.title: Review: HP’s Dragonfly Folio G3 stays cool and quiet in faux leather
entries.description: High-fashion 2-in-1's inflated price is more for its design than its performance.

entries.title: Rocket Report: Meet the Blue Origin Space Rangers; methane rocket fails in debut
entries.description: No one has yet stepped forth to win the great methane rocket race.
